mapper.select: SELECT m.id,c_content,b.name,c_post_date,b.profile_img,bsc_no FROM BANDSUBMIT_COMMENT m JOIN members b ON m.id=b.id order by bsc_no desc
mapper.update: UPDATE BANDSUBMIT_COMMENT SET c_content=#{c_content} WHERE bsc_no =#{bsc_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BANDSUBMIT_COMMENT WHERE bsc_no =#{bsc_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
